title: Demi Rose turns up the heat in a busty mirrored bodysuit as she enjoys another Halloween night out
text:
She channelled her inner evil showgirl as she enjoyed a wild outing earlier in the week.

And Demi Rose proved she's still in the Halloween spirit as she transformed into a futuristic bombshell for a party in London's Mayfair district on Saturday evening.

The glamour model, 24, caught the eye as she slipped her famously curvaceous physique into a silver mirrored bodysuit to ring in the annual celebration.

Wow-factor! Demi Rose proved she's still in the Halloween spirit as she transformed into a futuristic bombshell for a party in London's Mayfair district on Saturday evening

Leaving little to the imagination, the social media sensation paired her structured one-piece with a pair of fishnet tights.

The media personality amped up the glamour as she strutted across the streets of the English capital in a pair of chunky bedazzled platform boots, which worked well with her sparkly handbag.

Demi pulled out all the stops for her sexy look as she accessorised with statement choker necklaces and a chainmail coif, which held her low plait into place.

The brunette beauty accentuated her out-of-this-world beauty with heavily-winged eyeliner, matte foundation and nude lipgloss for her racy make-up look by artist Aaliyah Diaz.

All eyes on her: Leaving little to the imagination, the social media sensation paired her structured one-piece with a pair of fishnet tights

Making her way: The media personality amped up the glamour as she strutted across the streets of the English capital in a pair of chunky bedazzled platform boots

All in the details: Demi pulled out all the stops for her sexy look as she accessorised with statement choker necklaces and a chainmail coif, which held her low plait into place

Radiant: The brunette beauty accentuated her out-of-this-world beauty with heavily-winged eyeliner, matte foundation and nude lipgloss for her racy make-up look by artist Aaliyah Diaz

The Instagram sensation has garnered the attention of 10.4million followers since she propelled to fame after being romantically linked to Kylie Jenner's ex Tyga.

Since then, the swimwear icon has mainly kept her love with DJ Chris Martinez on the down-low, but confirmed their split earlier this month.

Demi and the DJ have vowed to continue as friends and to support each other's careers, despite the split.

A representative for the star told MailOnline: 'Unfortunately Demi & her boyfriend Chris Martinez have parted ways. They have ended as friends and continue to support each other throughout their careers.'

Catching the eye: She channelled her inner evil showgirl as she enjoyed a wild outing earlier in the week (pictured on Friday)

Proving the split to be positive and healthy for the stunner, the rep continued: 'Demi is single and very happy working on her career in the USA.'

Though Demi is no stranger to flaunting her figure on social media, she has kept her relationship with DJ Chris on the down-low, with the former couple having enjoyed a private romance primarily out of the limelight.

The model has also been linked to DJ Tom Zanetti in the past. In the wake of their split, Demi took to Instagram to share a snap, captioned: 'Thinking of you.'
description: The model, 24, proved she's still in the Halloween spirit as she transformed into a futuristic bombshell for a party in London's Mayfair district on Saturday evening.
